label: Kitchenware and Home Accessories
description: Products for the kitchen and home, including storage containers, utensils, and decorative items.

subcategories.label: Food Storage Containers
subcategories.description: Containers for storing food items, including bread bins, biscuit jars, and canisters.

subcategories.label: Kitchen Utensils
subcategories.description: Tools and utensils used in the kitchen, including chopping boards, egg cups, and tea strainers.

subcategories.label: Tableware
subcategories.description: Items used for serving and eating food, including dinner sets, mugs, and salt and pepper shakers.

subcategories.label: Home Decor
subcategories.description: Decorative items for the home, including vases, picture frames, and ornaments.
